name: LabBreak! (FoddyBall Remastered)
description:
ATTENTION, Agent!

An enemy operative at the Grav-Tech facility has stolen a priceless piece of experimental equipment! It makes use of centrifugal force and gravity wells to propel itself with a perpetual spin. The possibilities of this power are immense, and we cannot allow it to fall into the wrong hands.

That's where you come in. Once you've infiltrated the facility, you will pilot the device and make your escape.  This mission will be a challenge, but you're the best we've got.

Good luck, Agent! The world's fate is in your hands...


Controls:

A: left weight

R: Right weight

Shift + WASD: Boost when charged

`: activate cheats. Lets you use Shift + WASD whenever you want and without limitations
